title: algorithm
description: the type of algorithm used by the computing task

algorithmName.description: the case-sensitive common name of the algorithm, example: randomForest, cnn, llama3.1-8b...

algorithmUri.description: the URI of the model, if publicly available

framework.description: the common name of the software framework implementing the algorithm, if any

frameworkVersion.description: the version of the software framework implementing the algorithm, if any

classPath.description: the full class path of the algorithm within the framework, with elements separated by dots

parametersNumber.description: number of billions of total parameters of your model, e.g. 8 for llama3.1-8b

layersNumber.description: if deep learning, precise the number of layers in your network

epochsNumber.description: if training, the number of complete passes through the training dataset

optimizer.description: the algorithm used to optimize the models weights, e.g. gridSearch, lora, adam

quantization.description: the type of quantization used : fp32, fp16, b16, int8 ...

tuningMethod.description: the method of hyperparameters tuning used (if any), example: gridSearch, randomizedSearch...

hyperparameterName.description: the name of the hyperparameter, example: c, kernel, gamma, class_weight...

hyperparameterValue.description: the value of the hyperparameter, example: rbf, 1e-4, 10, linear...
